Module dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform
Package dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.serialization.string.entity

Class ComponentStringSerializer<I extends Component>

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.serialization.string.StringSerializer<I>
      • dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.serialization.string.entity.ComponentStringSerializer<I>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - component instance type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializer<I,​java.lang.String>
    public abstract class ComponentStringSerializer<I extends Component>
extends StringSerializer<I>
    Serializes components to strings. A serialized component matches the pattern PREFIX{key: val,...}, i.e. a unique identifier followed by a map.
